phrases: Look how the hamsters eat their food so squeaky clean.
Why would he give you something so COOL?!
He said he bought a new one so he will not use this anymore.
It is made by a different company, so none of the lenses fit.
As of today, I am with Team Canon!
Still, taking photos does not really sound like Bomba.
He is been doing it since high school.
It is just, he gets bored easily and jumps from hobby to hobby.
Yeah, that DOES sound like Bomba...
So, how about I snap off a shot while you just act natural?
If I am going to leave behind a memory of me, I may as well look good in it!
She makes it sound like I am painting her friggin' portrait...
Just hurry up and take it.
I was making some kind of weird face, was not I?!
You friggin' took it when you would only said Chee!
Photos are a lot of fun, huh?
Big Brother, there are some old photos in here.
I guess Bomba left the memory card in, huh?
She does not look happy at all.
And here is an old one of you!
You should not go looking at other people's photos.
I will give this memory card back to Bomba.
Still, finding old photos is kind of fun, huh?
Let us take tons of pics!
If I take photos of the hamsters, I might be able to enter them in a contest again!
Taihei, I bought a new camera, so I will give you my old one.
You want to come by and get it tomorrow?
But it is a single-lens, right?
Do not you want to hold on to it?
Tanukichi will be all grown before you know it.
She will not be living with you forever, right?
Take pictures of her now, while she is acting natural.
You will thank yourself for it later.
Man, there is nothing more to take pictures of in here.
Well, how about we go for a walk?
What do you want to take a picture of, Big Brother?
Let us take a picture of you drinking cola with the setting sun in the background!
There is no point in even being outside for that, is there?!
Hey, Bomba, you left your memory card in the camera you gave me the other day.
Were there any photos on it?
Why did you only take one pic?
And what is with this crazy-ass face?!
This is where you and I have made so many memories!
TSF, it says they are closed for cleaning.
Nyaon would be crowded, and we went to the candy store just the other day.
There is somewhere that I wish to go!
This department store is totally retro!
It is a nice old department store, indeed!
Even the story directory calls to mind a bygone age!
They do not even have a food court, just restaurants where you have to buy a ticket for your order!
Even the sign leading to the rooftop is wonderful, indeed!
It looks like an amusement park, indeed!
That crane arm is SUPER strong!
And so, Sylphin and I both grew fond of that nostalgic department store and started going there often.
I guess we should before it closes.
Well, it is an old building and there are not many customers, right?
It is great BECAUSE it is old and there are not many customers!
That is no way for the stores to stay open, is it?
There is not a single sign that says they are closing.
Sure, there are not many customers, but it is still got some life left in it.
Places like this make you hope they stick around, do not they?
So that even once you and I have become adults, we can reminisce and talk about that time when.
And as we are talking, we can think to ourselves, I am glad we became friends.
Was that always a vacant lot?
That is a lot of empty land...
I wonder if some big building used to be there.
There used to be... an amusement park there.
That is when I first realized...
There is somewhere that I wish to go!
Sylphin knew that the department store would be closing.
Hey, how about we all go to the amusement park on our next day off?
I would like to go, indeed!
Once we become adults, it will have changed completely.
But even if the scenery changes, there are some things that will never change...
Because they exist in our memories.
I got some rice in the mail, from Akita.
You should join us for dinner tonight!
I have to make sure I do not eat too much...
This is new crop rice, right?
I should make something extra tasty...
What do YOU always make, Ebina?
Um, if I am using rice, kiritanpo hotpot, or... oh, oyaki dumplings.
Yeah, you are from Akita all right.
Still, you need mochi rice for oyaki, and kiritanpo takes a lot of time to make.
If we are going to make something in time for lunch...
Sorry to drag you into the kitchen, but you will be a big help.
I-I am in the kitchen with Taihei!
It is like what Kirie said before!
Apparently, the way to a man's heart is through his stomach.
Feed Taihei some of your home cooking and you will land him for sure!
Is that from being from a farming family?
Do not you think it is a little cramped?
If I let her cook alone with Big Brother, she will find out HE IS the one who always makes the food.
I have to help out, at least a little.
Ebina, I will trim the chicken and dice the vegetables.
Would you mind rinsing the rice?
Well, we are going to cook the chicken, so you can get the frypan ready.
Leave it to me, Big Brother!
She should be able to do that, at least...
The larger one's down below there, so go ahead and add some oil for me.
Sure enough, I cannot do it!
You gave Ebina such a shock that she fell!
What if she would hurt herself?!
And why did you add that much oil just for browning the chicken?
Uh, I got a little confused...
The truth is, I cannot cook at all.
I wanted to grab him... but he grabbed me!
I wonder what is for dinner tonight...
Thursday is bread day, so what could it be?
Look who I ran into on the way home.
So, I invited her over for dinner.
And where did this meeting take place?
What are you all mad about?
Was it wrong for me to come, Big Brother?
It was her PLAN to come here, Big Brother!
It was just a coincidence, Big Brother.
And what is got you so angry?
She is had dinner with us before, right?
I saw him as he was leaving the office,
so I called out Big Brother! and he replied Hikari!
THAT IS NOT A COINCIDENCE AT ALL!
I just happened to be outside of his office and he just happened to come out.
There is nothing coincidental about that!
I thought those two were friends...
What is got Umaru in such a bad mood?
Still, maybe Hikari came over so they can get closer.
Is not it bread day today?
Okay, I think it is ready now.
All of us making something together will probably help them break the ice.
I shall make you the perfect pancake, Big Brother!
All you have to do is pour this on here!
Big Brother, I can make a better one.
The trick is to wait until the surface starts to bubble.
It is fun to make food together, is not it?
You said you made them for me, right?
Big Brother, do not force yourself.
There is no way those will taste good.
I came because I wanted to eat bread with you.
That is pretty incredible that you got an award.
Why are you getting so mad?
They recommended that I take AP classes too!
Ooh, and the wild hamsters have appeared!
Let us get your hamster ball ready!
Do not treat your hamsters like toys!
Y-you have got it all wrong, Big Brother.
Even if you are trying to play, your pets are not having any fun.
I mean, look at their faces.
They are making the same face as always...
Look, small animals have been known to die from stress.
They are always in the same place, inside their cage.
You have to treat them with care, right?
Master, are you not letting them out today?
Yeah, he thinks I tire them out by playing with them too much.
A-a long time ago at an aquarium I went to, I heard that even fish can feel stress.
All those people coming and going and standing there in front of them...
Well, the hamsters always stay inside the house, so I think they are okay!
Umaru must be tough to put up with.
She is a bit selfish, but do not hold it against her, okay?
Well, that was the usual fun and games...
Still, it is not like you can understand me.
You are not feeling any stress, right?
I wonder if Big Brother will be home soon...
You two want to play with me after all!
Today it is the Pokeham the Movie 2000!
I told you not to play with your hamsters!
So it is just us doing the preview again, huh?
Last time there were just WAY too many spoilers!
It says here in the script, It will be fine.
In a way, faith is the biggest, most irresponsible kicker of them all, huh?
